00029 #include <iostream>
00030 #include <fstream>
00031 
00032 
00033 using namespace std;
00034 using namespace pwiz::util;
00035 using namespace pwiz::msdata;
00036 using boost::shared_ptr;
00037 
00038 
00039 ostream* os_ = 0;
00040 
00041 
00042 void testWriteRead(const MSData& msd, const Serializer_mzML::Config& config)
00043 {
00044     if (os_) *os_ << "testWriteRead() " << config << endl;
00045 
00046     Serializer_mzML mzmlSerializer(config);
00047 
00048     ostringstream oss;
00049     mzmlSerializer.write(oss, msd);
00050 
00051     if (os_) *os_ << "oss:\n" << oss.str() << endl; 
00052 
00053     shared_ptr<istringstream> iss(new istringstream(oss.str()));
00054     MSData msd2;
00055     mzmlSerializer.read(iss, msd2);
00056 
00057     Diff<MSData> diff(msd, msd2);
00058     if (os_ && diff) *os_ << diff << endl; 
00059     unit_assert(!diff);
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 void testWriteRead()
00064 {
00065     MSData msd;
00066     examples::initializeTiny(msd);
00067 
00068     Serializer_mzML::Config config;
00069     unit_assert(config.binaryDataEncoderConfig.precision == BinaryDataEncoder::Precision_64);
00070     testWriteRead(msd, config);
00071 
00072     config.binaryDataEncoderConfig.precision = BinaryDataEncoder::Precision_32;
00073     testWriteRead(msd, config);
00074 
00075     config.indexed = false;
00076     testWriteRead(msd, config);
00077 
00078     // TODO: test with compression 
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00083 {
00084     try
00085     {
00086         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00087         testWriteRead();
00088         return 0;
00089     }
00090     catch (exception& e)
00091     {
00092         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00093     }
00094     catch (...)
00095     {
00096         cerr << "Caught unknown exception.\n";
00097     }
00098     
00099     return 1;
00100 }
